it.polimi.se2019.view.gui

Class BoardPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.util.Observable<Request>
      • it.polimi.se2019.view.gui.BoardPane

  • public class BoardPane
extends Observable<Request>
    GUI controller of the board pane displayed in main game screen
    Author:
    Andrea Falanti

        Parameters:

      • addKillToKilltrack

        public void addKillToKilltrack(PlayerColor color,
                               boolean overkill)
        Add token with killer color to killtrack, if overkill add a label that indicate that 2 tokens are added. If in frenzy, it display a new box and add tokens to correct label.
        Parameters:
        color - Killer color
        overkill - Indicate if kill is an overkill

      • updateActivePlayerText

        Update active player text
        Parameters:
        color - Active player color

                                 PlayerColor color)
        Move player pawn of desired color to given position
        Parameters:
        pos - Position where the player is moved
        color - Player color that is moved

        Parameters:

        y - Coordinate y in grid

      • initializeFrenzyKilltrack

        private void initializeFrenzyKilltrack()
        Create and initialize frenzy killtrack bonus box. It's set invisible but it will be activated when first kill in frenzy mode is scored.

      • updateBoardTile
